abstract: More than 10 years ago, Sean Parker and Shawn Fanning created Napster, the music-sharing service. Now they’re unveiling a new joint venture: a start-up called Airtime, a social video service that lets people chat with their Facebook friends and random strangers online.

lead_paragraph: Ozier Muhammad/The New York TimesShawn Fanning, left, and Sean Parker at Tuesday’s event.

headline.main: Napster Founders Unveil a Video Chat Service
